author: charleslegoguy
title: Cool minifigure
review: This minifigure is quite easy to feel from the bag. It will be like a long cylinder like shape with a cone shaped end. This minifigure includes a new crayon costume part with a nicely detailed print. I like both expressions on her. However, I still do appreciate the more and more creative minifigure costumes lego has been coming out with so I am happy to add this one to my collection!

author: Odeinoichus
title: Purple is the new Black.
review:
Set #71023 Crayon Girl: Dressed as a purple crayon this young lady includes a printed tile with drawing on it and a massive costume element which means her torso is completely unprinted.

The costume has printing of little flower emblems and her legs are dual-moulded giving us some nice rich dark purple boots/socks, she also has two expressions, open-eye smiling and closed-eye smiling. Actually the lack of printing for this character makes her parts perfect for Monofig collectors. She has dark purple hands unfortunately and I'm not sure a light purple hand has been made before. I foresee an entire box of crayons at some point to re-use this piece, we still need green, blue, red, orange, yellow, black, white, grey, metallic grey, pearl gold, light green, tangerine twist... er... and whatever other colours I've forgotten from my big box of crayons.

Highly Recommended.
